Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical properties of PCDSeBT were investigated by cyclic voltammetry ( CV ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| electrochemical properties |
| cyclic voltammetry (CV) |

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "electrochemical properties" and "cyclic voltammetry (CV)". "Electrochemical properties" refers to the characteristics related to the chemical reactions that involve electrical charges or currents. "Cyclic voltammetry (CV)" is an analytical technique used to investigate the electrochemical properties of a material.

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property", the only valid entity in the paragraph is "electrochemical properties". This term refers to the characteristics related to the chemical reactions that involve electrical charges or currents in the material PCDSeBT. The other entity "cyclic voltammetry (CV)" is a technique used to investigate the material's properties, not a property itself.
